violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provided last name 'Постнов' at 0:04.238. Operator repeated incorrectly as 'Портнов' without asking for confirmation ('Верно?'). Customer had to correct operator at 0:04.276 saying 'Постнов'. Echo method requires explicit confirmation request.

violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting
violations_detected.evidence: After operator completed information search and provided full product specifications (wheels/disk specs from 0:03.174 to 0:03.489), customer responded at 0:03.502 with no thank you expressed for waiting. Rule requires gratitude after search completion.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not applied for contact data verification
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When customer provides name, phone, or address, always repeat it back and ask for explicit confirmation ('Верно?', 'Правильно?', 'Подтверждаете?'). Do not assume understanding - get explicit 'Да' confirmation. This prevents errors like the 'Портнов/Постнов' mix-up.

coaching_priorities.issue: Missing courtesy thank you after information search
coaching_priorities.recommendation: After completing a system search and providing information to customer, always thank them for waiting (example: 'Спасибо, что ждали' or 'Спасибо за терпение'). This should happen even if you checked in with customer during search.

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language detected from operator throughout call

2.1.evidence: Operator completed service and properly closed call. No dropout or refusal.

3.1.evidence: Customer request to place order was fully resolved. Order was successfully placed and confirmation received.

3.3.evidence: No confidential information (office numbers, codes, passwords) disclosed

3.6.evidence: Operator searched system for product specifications before providing information

4.1.evidence: Customer remained engaged throughout. No signs of frustration or tone decline detected in text. Operator adapted to customer's need to search their own system.
4.1.note: Text-based assessment only - full tone analysis requires audio

5.1.evidence: All necessary information for order placement provided: location (Камешкова), product code (Р47240), auto details (Ховал 2025 1.5М6), phone confirmation. Follow-up contact info provided (manager callback tomorrow after 9am Chelyabinsk time).
5.1.note: Partial assessment without project config for mandatory fields

6.1.evidence: No critical silence. Operator maintained communication throughout. Customer did not hang up.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name (74 колеса) and operator name (Ирина). Professional closing with thanks and farewell. Script sequence followed logically.

7.2.evidence: Last name 'Постнов' repeated incorrectly as 'Портнов' without confirmation request. Customer had to correct. See violations_detected for details.
7.2.note: Critical violation - echo method is proven high-value safety check

7.3.evidence: Intro greeting starts at 0:00.835 (< 5s). Disconnect at 0:07.51.984 with last customer speech at 0:07.51.484 (< 5s gap).

7.4.evidence: No abrupt customer interruptions detected without apology

9.1.evidence: Product specification search from 0:03.174 to 0:03.489 (15 seconds from code receipt to specs delivery). Well under 40-second threshold.
9.1.note: Customer provided product code from their system; operator search for specs was efficient

9.3.evidence: After completing product information search and delivery of full specifications, no thank you expressed to customer for waiting

10.2.evidence: Information provided per call center script for order placement. Logical flow: greet, identify issue, find product, collect details, place order, confirm.

10.3.evidence: Customer name used consistently throughout call (Сергей, Сергей Постнов). Professional rapport maintained. Operator managed conversation to successful order completion.

10.6.evidence: Product information delivered accurately (wheels R47240 specs including bolt pattern, width, offset, hub size). Delivery policy explained (free over 30k rubles). Order successfully processed.
10.6.note: Partial assessment without full project configuration

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company name and operator name
Excellent problem-solving: helped customer complete order when website failed
Efficient product specification search and delivery (15 seconds)
Used customer name consistently throughout conversation
Successfully navigated customer through order placement process
Provided clear follow-up information (callback timing and Chelyabinsk timezone reference)
Confirmed order number with customer (96-65-76) and SMS receipt
Clarified payment method options when customer expressed preference

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level JSON not yet reviewed for 7.2 detection - assessment based on VTT timing analysis
